com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.widget

Class WidgetDefaults

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.widget.WidgetDefaults

  • public class WidgetDefaults
extends Object
    Default configurations used by the dynamic widgets.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static float ADS_ALPHA_DISABLED
      Default alpha when the widget is disabled.
      static float ADS_ALPHA_ENABLED
      Default alpha when the widget is enabled.
      static float ADS_ALPHA_HINT
      Default alpha for the hint.
      static float ADS_ALPHA_PRESSED
      Default alpha when the widget is pressed.
      static float ADS_ALPHA_SCRIM
      Default alpha for the scrim insets.
      static float ADS_ALPHA_SELECTED
      Default alpha value for the selected state to generate color state list dynamically.
      static float ADS_ALPHA_TOAST
      Default alpha for the toast.
      static float ADS_ALPHA_UNCHECKED
      Default alpha value for the unselected state to generate color state list dynamically.
      static boolean ADS_BACKGROUND_AWARE
      Default value to make widgets background aware so that they can change color according to the theme background to provide best visibility.
      static int ADS_COLOR_EDGE_EFFECT
      Default edge effect or glow color used by the scrollable widgets.
      static int ADS_COLOR_SCROLL_BAR
      Default scroll bar used by the scrollable widgets.
      static int ADS_COLOR_UNKNOWN
      Constant for the unknown color.
      static float ADS_CORNER_MIN_BOX
      Minimum corner size in dips for the box background.
      static float ADS_CORNER_MIN_TABS
      Minimum corner size in dips to provide the rounded tab indicator.
      static float ADS_CORNER_SELECTOR_RECT
      Minimum corner size in dips to provide the rounded rectangle list selector.
      static float ADS_CORNER_SELECTOR_ROUND
      Minimum corner size in dips to provide the rounded list selector.
      static boolean ADS_FILL_SPACE
      Default value to fill the empty icon space.
      static boolean ADS_RTL_SUPPORT
      Default value to provide the dynamic RTL support.
      static float ADS_SHIFT_DARK
      Default value to shift a dark color.
      static float ADS_SHIFT_LIGHT
      Default value to shift a light color.
      static boolean ADS_SHOW_DIVIDER
      Default value to show a divider below the widgets.
      static float ADS_STATE_BOX_DARK
      Default dark state value for the box background.
      static float ADS_STATE_BOX_LIGHT
      Default light state value for the box background.
      static float ADS_STATE_DARK
      Default value to darken the color.
      static float ADS_STATE_LIGHT
      Default value to lighten the color.
      static float ADS_STATE_PRESSED
      Default value for the pressed state.
      static boolean ADS_STYLE_BORDERLESS
      Default borderless value for the widgets.
      static boolean ADS_TINT_BACKGROUND
      Default tint background value for the widgets.

      • ADS_BACKGROUND_AWARE

        public static final boolean ADS_BACKGROUND_AWARE
        Default value to make widgets background aware so that they can change color according to the theme background to provide best visibility.

        true to make widgets background aware.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ADS_STYLE_BORDERLESS

        public static final boolean ADS_STYLE_BORDERLESS
        Default borderless value for the widgets.

        true if the widget is borderless.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ADS_TINT_BACKGROUND

        public static final boolean ADS_TINT_BACKGROUND
        Default tint background value for the widgets.

        true to enable the background tinting.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ADS_SHOW_DIVIDER

        public static final boolean ADS_SHOW_DIVIDER
        Default value to show a divider below the widgets.

        true to show the divider.

        See Also:

        public static final boolean ADS_FILL_SPACE
        Default value to fill the empty icon space.

        true to fill the space.

      • getBackgroundAware

        public static int getBackgroundAware()
        Returns the default value for the background functionality used by the various widgets.
        Returns:
        The default value for the background functionality used by the various widgets.
        See Also:
        Theme.BackgroundAware

      • getContrastWithColor

        public static int getContrastWithColor(Context context)
        Get default contrast with color from the theme.

        Generally, it should be a background color so that widgets can change their color accordingly if they are background aware.

        Parameters:
        context - The context to retrieve theme and resources.
        Returns:
        The default contrast with color.
        See Also:
        com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.R.attr#ads_contrastWithDefault
